Package Controllers

Class TicketManager

java.lang.Object
Controllers.TicketManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Manager
public class TicketManager extends Object implements Manager
Ticket Manager allows console user to create, read, update, and delete tickets.

  • Method Details

    • createTicket

      public static int createTicket(Scanner sc, int userId)
      Create Ticket to put into the database. UserID must be provided unless created by guest.
      Parameters:
      sc - takes in scanner to instantiate various attributes within the function
      userId - user ID to be associated with ticket
      Returns:
      ticketID if successfully created, otherwise return -1.

    • readTicket

      public static void readTicket(int ticketId)
      Read ticket by ticketID.
      Parameters:
      ticketId - ticket ID to be read

    • findTicket

      public static Ticket findTicket(int ticketId)
      Find ticket by ticketID
      Parameters:
      ticketId - ticket ID of ticket to be found
      Returns:
      Object of type Ticket

    • updateTicket

      public static boolean updateTicket(Scanner sc)
      Update ticket
      Parameters:
      sc - Asks for ticket ID to search for to update fields Uses scanner to update these fields
      Returns:
      true if success, false otherwise

    • deleteTicket

      public static ArrayList deleteTicket(int movieGoerId)
      Delete ticket by ticketID
      Parameters:
      movieGoerId - ticket ID to be deleted
      Returns:
      Array list with ticket deleted

    • updateMovieGoerIdOfTickets

      public static void updateMovieGoerIdOfTickets(int oldMovieGoerId, int newMovieGoerId)
      Update Movie Goer ID of tickets
      Parameters:
      oldMovieGoerId - Old Movie Goer ID to be replaced
      newMovieGoerId - New Movie Goer ID to replace

    • readTickets

      protected static ArrayList readTickets(String filename) throws IOException
      reading (helper func, declared as private as it is only called within this file) This creates a list of instances of movieGoers
      Parameters:
      filename - File to be read
      Returns:
      Array list with read values
      Throws:
      IOException - I/O Error with input
